content:
Congratulations on submitting your thesis proposal! That's a huge milestone. I'm glad I could help you with your citations. Remember, staying organized and accurate with your references is crucial, but it's also important to take breaks and celebrate your progress. You've got this!

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, don't hesitate to ask. I'm here to help. Good luck with your thesis, and I hope it goes smoothly from here on out!
